title: Efficient one-pot synthesis of glycosyl disulphides
abstract: NoMethodology for the efficient and facile synthesis of glycosyl disulfides is reported. A one-pot procedure employing mild conditions using diethyl azodicarboxylate is described to synthesise a series of glycosyl disulfides in excellent yields
